original:
Prague, Czech Republic - The President of Komercní Banka, the second-largest bank in the country, has announced his candidacy for the Senate in the upcoming elections. Jan Juchelka, who has been at the helm of the bank since 2018, has been campaigning on a platform of regulatory reform in the Czech banking sector.
Juchelka's candidacy comes at a time when the country's banking sector is facing sev
sampled:
Prague, Czech Republic - The President of Komercní Banka, the second-largest bank in the country, has announced his candidacy for the Senate in the upcoming elections. Jan Juchelka, who has been at the helm of the bank since 2018, has been campaigning on a platform about regulatory realignment in the Czech banking sector.
